headline: Baird Maintains Neutral on Leidos Holdings, Lowers Price Target to $195
summary: Baird  analyst Peter Arment   maintains Leidos Holdings (NYSE:LDOS) with a Neutral and lowers the price target from $215 to $195.

headline: Leidos: The Selloff Was Warranted Following A Weak Earnings Report
summary: Leidos (LDOS) rated Hold: Q4 revenue softness, tepid growth and govt reliance limit upside despite ~10% undervaluation.

raw.headline: Leidos: The Selloff Was Warranted Following A Weak Earnings Report

headline: LDOS Q4 Deep Dive: Revenue Miss and Strategic Investments Shape Outlook
summary: Defense contractor Leidos (NYSE:LDOS) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales falling 3.6% year on year to $4.21 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $17.7 billion at the midpoint came in 1.3% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.76 per share was 5.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
